alert.note: Alert for East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco Bay Shoreline (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 04 at 10:26PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Alameda and southwestern Contra Costa Counties through 1100 PM PST... At 1026 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Emeryville, or near Oakland, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oakland, Berkeley, Richmond, San Leandro, Alameda, Walnut Creek, Pleasant Hill, Lafayette, El Cerrito, Hercules, Albany, Pinole, Orinda, Moraga, Piedmont, Emeryville, Kensington, Moraga Town, Waldon and El Sobrante. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco Bay Shoreline
